text: Alauddin Ali (24 December 1952 â€“ 9 August 2020) was a Bangladeshi music composer. He won the Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Music Director five times for the movies Golapi Ekhon Traine (1978), Sundori (1979), Koshai (1980), Jogajog (1988) and Lakhe Ekta (1990). He won the Best Music Composer award for the movie Laal Doriya (2002) and the Best Lyrics award for Premik (1985). Ali died on 9 August 2020 at a private hospital in Dhaka from lung cancer, aged 67. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:20th-century composers Category:Bangladeshi musicians Category:21st- century composers Category:People from Munshiganj District
title: Alauddin Ali
